name: 125 MONKEY GAMES
description:
125 MONKEY GAMES FOR YOUR MONKEY ENJOYMENT. GATHER SPEED ON THE MONKEY RAMP THEN PRESS SPACE TO OPEN THE MONKEY WINGS IN THE AIR. MONKEY GLIDE TO CATCH BANANAS AND LAND ON A HIGH SCORING TARGET!!!

MONKEY CONTROLS
space - begin glide, end glide
arrows - steer glide, ascend, descend

MONKEY MAKERS
graphics - claire morley
programming & audio - mark wonnacott

MONKEY CREDITS
splash.wav (modified) - Kayyy
